tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Philanthropic_Foundations (
    foundation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    foundation_name VARCHAR(255),
    funding_amount DECIMAL,
    social_initiative VARCHAR(255),
    impact_evaluation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Grants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  foundation_id UUID REFERENCES Foundations(id),
  amount DECIMAL,
  recipient VARCHAR,
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Foundations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  focus_area VARCHAR,
  founding_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Foundation (
  foundation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  foundation_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  funds_allocated DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SocialInitiative (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  funding_amount DECIMAL,
  foundation_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_foundation_id FOREIGN KEY (foundation_id) REFERENCES Foundation(foundation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactEvaluation (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  impact_rating INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_initiative_id FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES SocialInitiative(initiative_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Initiatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Grants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    foundation_id INT,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (foundation_id) REFERENCES Foundations(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES Initiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImpactMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES Initiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Grants (
   grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   grant_amount DECIMAL,
   grant_date DATE,
   recipient_id INT,
   project_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
   project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(255),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Impact (
   impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_id INT,
   outcome TEXT,
   evaluation_date DATE,
   evaluator_name VARCHAR(255)
);
